content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: Mister Heine, thank you for your time. I would like to negotiate the rental price for the apartment. What are your thoughts on a fair price?
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: Mister Heine, I would like to propose a rental price of 500 Euros per month. This is a reasonable market price for a 25-square-meter apartment in this area. What are your thoughts on this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I appreciate your proposal, Mister Heine. However, I am looking for a lower rental price. I believe that a monthly rental price of 400 Euros would be more reasonable for a 25-square-meter apartment in this area. Would you be willing to consider this price?
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content:
Mister Heine, I am sorry to say that a monthly rental price of 400 Euros would not be feasible for me. I have other expenses to consider and I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment. I believe that a monthly rental price of 500 Euros is a fair market price for this apartment. Would you be willing to consider this price?

If not, I will have to search for someone else who is willing to pay more.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your concern, Mister Heine. However, I am still looking for a lower rental price. I believe that a monthly rental price of 450 Euros would be a more reasonable price for a 25-square-meter apartment in this area. Would you be willing to consider this price?
name: Aziz Trabelsi
